remarks: Deduction for combining cases.  (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2004.)
statement:
ccased.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( ps /\ ch ) -> et ) ) $.
ccased.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( th /\ ch ) -> et ) ) $.
ccased.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( ps /\ ta ) -> et ) ) $.
ccased.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( th /\ ta ) -> et ) ) $.
ccased $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( ps \/ th ) /\ ( ch \/ ta ) ) -> et ) ) $.
